1.title: Anti-Inflammatory Mustard
1.plot: Brandon tackles the key ingredients to look for when buying mustard and examines the benefits of Turmeric in an inflammation healing diet.

2.title: Corn Syrup and Ketchup
2.plot: Corn derived substances are in just about everything we consume. Brandon breaks down the bad, its effects and cleans it up. Leaving you with the healthiest alternatives.

3.title: Digestion Healing Mayo
3.plot: Find out the alarming health concerns associated with it's major ingredients and what to avoid (not only for mayo but other major foods as well). Remember, it's a process. It's one simple change at a time.

4.title: Sugar and Reducing Inflammation
4.plot: In this Halloween special, Brandon and his friend hilariously discuss our crazy obsession with sugar and the toll it takes on the body. Leaving you with a new logic and healthier alternatives by making one simple change.

5.title: Immune System Boosting Butter
5.plot: Butter. No longer on a roll. Brandon exposes the sad truths about how butter reacts in the body and, following his "one simple change at a time" approach, leaves you with some healthy alternatives.

6.title: Bacteria Building Probiotic Pickles
6.plot: Our bodies have a third less bacteria then undeveloped nations. It's time to fix that. Brandon does just that by examining fermented pickles and diving into the world of healthy bacteria and probiotics.

7.title: Nut Butters & Harmful Additives
7.plot: Essential fiber and nutrients, when in the right form. Outside of that, nut butters do more harm then good and it's a very simple change. Here, Brandon guides you through the different types of nut butters and their benefits.

8.title: Eggs and Poor Nutrition
8.plot: Another staple ingredient for the majority of our classic recipes. Sad thing is, the quality and effects eggs have on the body is poor. Brandon walks you through the choices and leaves you with simple alternatives for health and happiness.

imdb.plot outline: Each episode of My Simple Changes offers a humorous, easy-to-follow guide for finding the best simple changes, with products and lifestyle, to improve your health. I've had a lifelong battle with autoimmune disease and discovered how to alleviate symptoms, based around experience, educating myself and healing inflammation in the body. If you have an autoimmune disorder, Crohn's disease or are living through your ailments and wanting change, but it's overwhelming and you don't know where to start, you're in the right spot.
imdb.title: My Simple Changes
plot: Healing inflammation and alleviating associated symptoms, one simple change at a time.::Brandon Godsey

Each episode of _My Simple Changes_ (qv) offers a humorous, easy-to-follow guide for finding the best simple changes, with products and lifestyle, to improve your health. I've had a lifelong battle with autoimmune disease and discovered how to alleviate symptoms, based around experience, educating myself and healing inflammation in the body. If you have an autoimmune disorder, Crohn's disease or are living through your ailments and wanting change, but it's overwhelming and you don't know where to start, you're in the right spot.::Brandon Godsey
